Description: Gentle exercise to increase shoulder mobility post-injury or surgery.

Exercise Name: Shoulder External Rotation with Resistance Band
Description: Strengthens the rotator cuff muscles to improve shoulder stability.
Enhances shoulder flexibility and range of motion.
Strengthens the quadriceps without bending the knee.
Isometric exercise to activate and strengthen the quadriceps.
Improves knee flexion range of motion post-surgery or injury.
Targets hip abductors to improve hip stability.
Strengthens hip abductors and improves lateral hip movement.
Enhances flexibility of the hip flexor muscles.
Improves circulation and prevents stiffness in the ankle joint.
Strengthens the intrinsic muscles of the foot.
Strengthens the calf muscles and improves ankle stability.
Enhances core stability and spinal alignment.
Improves lower back flexibility and reduces pain.
Improves cardiovascular fitness safely post-cardiac events.
Improves upper limb coordination and strength post-neurological events.
Assists in relearning walking patterns and improving balance.
